rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area with integrated kitchen adjoining an extended lounge space.
rooms.vastu_compliance: East facing entrance ensures positive flow of energy.

rooms.name: Courtyard
rooms.description: Central open courtyard acting as a light well and ventilation hub.

openings.description: Primary entrance door facilitating direct access to the courtyard.
Sliding garage doors for easy access and adherence to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom.
rooms.vastu_compliance: South-east orientation recommended for privacy and stability.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom, equally comfortable with a small balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: Balcony/ Veranda
rooms.description: Adjacent to guest bedroom, offering outdoor seating and views.
rooms.vastu_compliance: West oriented for relaxation and cooling effects.

openings.description: Staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, ensuring secure access while following Vastu principles of balance.
